website_summaries.verdict: A good value on an inflatable spout cover to protect baby in the bath.
pros: Inflatable air pockets make the cover very soft and safe
Cute, but not so cute kids will want to play with it
Inexpensive way to add safety in the bath
You can adjust the size by adjusting the amount of air you use to fill up the cover
cons: Since this is inflatable, it can get a puncture and become useless

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My babyis a wild child and she loves standing up when she's in the bathtub. So this product is great because all you have to do is inflate and put it around your spout and you can turn it just in case your spout is longer in the front like mine. it is easy to clean and I would say the best product for the price as well. Other products that I've seen that are hard plastic with characters or animals on them end up getting black mold inside of them and they're very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to add a hole to the top
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem making a hole in the top for the shower diverter. There is a big strip along the top that is sealed from leaking air, which makes this a simple modification.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gouge

customer_reviews.title: Added safety
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. When blown up fully it's very sturdy. If baby was to bump into it she would be totally fine and free from hurting herself. There is a strip on top, clearly lined out where you can cut in order to fit exactly on your own shower diverter.
customer_reviews.author: CYN

customer_reviews.title: Fits on hard to fit spouts
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have a skip hop whale spout cover for one bath but it would not fit on this spout. This cover is not only inexpensive, but it fits on spouts that other covers don’t. It provides plenty of protection and is easy to slip on & off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Cut a hole in the top for shower spout
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I cut a hole in the top that doesn't inflate for the shower knob. Blew it up once and have not had in re-inflate yet. My 9.5 month old doesn't think it's a toy and has literally touched it once and left it alone since. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: Since it was three bucks, it'll suffice. Not all the sections inflate, but a couple side sections and the front work. The front is where I really wanted cushion, so it serves its purpose for us.
customer_reviews.author: kring

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have a hole for the spout diverter.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and cheap. You can’t go wrong with this thing when the price is so cheap. The only issue I had is that it didn’t have a hole for the spout diverter. It was pretty easy to just take a knife and cut a whole myself so I’m not mad at all. My little one is constantly trying to eat the faucet so this has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity C.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but not perfect after deflation
customer_reviews.text: I started out really loving this spout cover, but since my kids have still hit their heads on the spout, my opinion has gone down. When it is fully inflated, it does a great job. But, it loses a little air and the bottom of our spout sticks out the bottom. It covers the sides well, and I liked that it was 2 for the price, so when the first one lost too much air, I didn't feel bad about replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've used more expensive cutesie covers since I started having kids, the whale and elmo. They are hard though and spin on my faucets, so we have had accidents-- still better than nothing. Then I decided to try this cheap inflatable. It's perfect! Fits perfect, doesn't move around and there are no hard spots. Also keeps my eldest from bumping his head on the metal when he lays under it (the harder ones offer no cushioning at the actual spout). Extremely happy, you live, you learn! Sometimes the cheaper products are better. It's been a while and have not had to re inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Barlow Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worked well while it lasted - two months
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use and served its purpose well. However, after just a few months it’s now deflated due to a small hole. At first I thought, no big deal it’s only $2 I’ll just buy a new one. However it’s now $9! Not worth it for a product I can only get a few months use out of.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Buckley

customer_reviews.title: A must need for toddlers in the tub!
customer_reviews.text: I’d have given this 5 stars but mine came with multiple holes in it. Although it was only 2 bucks so I can’t beat that and will order another. Cheapest one I’ve found. I love that’s you fill it will air and it’s squishy. The others are pretty hard still so it would still hurt if a child’s head hit it.
customer_reviews.author: erica_vera_books

customer_reviews.title: Great at protecting little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I had one for a long time but it got black and yucky on the inside. Thought I could go without one seeing my girls were older, 4/6. One night my 4 yo stood up under the facet and scrapped her back. I immediately bought 2 of these for when it gets yucky again. It works great and protects them from harm.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy44

customer_reviews.title: Don’t listen to other reviews...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people complained that there isn’t a hole for the spout button to be pulled up while this cover is on, but there is more that enough space for the button to be pulled up while it’s on... no need to cut a hole into it... this product worked great for us! No issue at all...
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use upside down - as my little one seemed she would clunk her head upwards instead of down into the spout. So I just swivel it around and it works perfectly for my purpose. The water hole allows room for the ‘shower pull’. Bonus my son uses it as a floating toy boat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Swick

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the most elaborate one but it does the job (as long as the kid doesn’t pull it off 🤦🏼‍♀️) and is worth it for the price. It’s already lasted longer than I thought it would. For a few bucks, what have you got to lose?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It’s not great, but for less than $3, it was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but it was a hassle. It took me at least ten tries to get this blown up enough where it actually worked. It’s definitely cheaply made, but it also cost very little, so I’m okay with it! Overall, not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: JHoffart

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that effectively covers a standard bath spout to prevent injury. It's easy enough to inflate and deflate and travels well. The quality is a lot better than expected and has held up very well with daily use. We tried other more popular spout covers but this was the softest and easiest option. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for nothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler God son cuz he’s honestly a little clumsy guy.. and he’s still working out the idea that survival and self preservation are NOT optional.. Today he managed to bust up his poor little forehead on the tub spout DESPITE this thing supposedly “protecting him” from the concussion fairies... Seriously.. YOU HAD ONE JOB, faucet condom... zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Adhesha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby's Bath!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after trying and returning several similar products to stores. Most were very hard plastic and they just didn't fit our spout right. I decided to try this one and it didn't disappoint. It's soft so if my daughter does hit her head I know it won't hurt and it provides a lot of cushion. I also like that it's adjustable by the amount of air you put in it. I can't say enough good things about this! And the price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: DLTench

customer_reviews.title: Never choosing any other cover again
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great quality. Best spout cover I've ever had. Other spout covers was still too hard and would hurt my son if he banged his head on them but this is perfect because it's inflatable!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It stays inflated, even weeks after I first inflated it. It is easy to slide over my faucet and it doesn't interfere with water flow. Great safety feature for the tub. Update: 8 months later and it is still inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Donna

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Fits faucet nice and protects baby from hitting their head. Cost effective solution. Don’t pay for the more expensive ones, this works great! I just ordered another for my daughter in law!
customer_reviews.author: L Farnese

customer_reviews.title: It may work, probably not long
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it will be okay, I didn't like the fact I actually have to cut the top so the shower pull thing can be exposed, I see it not lasting long honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Buy one of these.
customer_reviews.text: A must have to prevent little ones from bumping their heads on your tub facet. Had one for my kids 25 years ago. Was glad to find they are still being made. Recently purchased one to have on hand for grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect safety aid to cover our bathroom tubs faucet. It is inflatable, so you may need to blow it back up a little every so often. I had no issues with mold growth, but I do rinse and dry it as well as wipe it down every week or so. It fits our old tubs faucet perfectly, but some time we need to move it a bit as it can obstruct the water a little. But it's a super easy fix, and I would purchase again. My daughter is 2 and doesn't pull it off, but would be able to if she wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: JennaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: A simple solution to a simple problem without a price gouge. Fits my older home's tub faucet to the tee and alined perfectly with the water spicket. I prefer the inflatable over the silicone, more cushion for the pushin! Sorta speak. Thank you so much for making the product reasonable and simple for my sweet clumsy kids.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money. It’s great for Bathtime!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and used it for years and loved it! Then I had to find another one and found this one. It is great for bathtime and is perfect for protecting little ones heads in the tub. It’s easy to prepare and slides on the tub spout. Its very cushy and provides great protection you are looking for. It even comes in a pack of 2. Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath time safety
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place on the tub nozzle, saves the baby from accidents and possible bruising when playing in the tub.. pretty designs. Definitely great product ever made for the tub
customer_reviews.author: Marie George

customer_reviews.title: Great Invention!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bargain! We have one and I ordered a second one for a friend. It fits both of our faucets and helps to prevent injuries in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Bookshelf

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted & needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to cover our spout for safety but also something that didn't draw my son's attention to play with it. This fits very snugly so he can't pull it off but he hasn't really wanted to because it's not designed to look like a toy. This spout cover was easy to blow up and fit over the spout. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than replacing Teeth ;o)
customer_reviews.text: Portable, as it weighs nothing for travel to hotels/grandma's house. Well made and does the job, highly recommend for adding that touch of additional safety to bath time. Oh, and we are not helicopter parents, my 1 year old has bumps and bruises we let him explore things that will not hurt him. But the risk for injury on unstable feet is there & teeth are not cheap to fix... so this was a no-brainer. Buy one if you don't have one already in your child's bath, & get one to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: RicktheMc

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the hard plastic ones but I have to blow it up for every bath because the air doesn’t stay in for more than 24 hours. Doesn’t annoy me too much as it takes 2 seconds to blow up and our son takes a bath every other day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Michaella Liz

customer_reviews.title: floaty
customer_reviews.text: it may just seem like a floaty that goes on your tub faucet but it serves the purpose and puts my mind at ease knowing my little one wont hit her head. (Also there is a clear spot at the top that doesn't hold air you can cut a small slit in it and put the faucet pully thingy through it.....you know what im talking about) Great for the amount you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: avery edwards

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fits snugly, it's made out of the same material as a blow up pool toy, so just be gentle in putting it on your faucet, so as not to cut it if your faucet has a sharp bottom. I reccommend it, I've tried a few different products and this is the only thing that actually fit. !Update! We did eventually have a small hole but repaired it by globbing some super glue, stI'll like this better than anything else we've tried
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Really Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have two young children and this was perfect. It took about 30 seconds to blow up and put on the faucet. Now I don't have to worry about kids hitting there heads.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Quibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, best price.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine unless they come up from under the faucet. But "where's the whale" is a thing now. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle1122

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't seem to find a spout cover that would fit my spout. Then I found this one and it fits perfectly and works. My son is always hitting his head on the bathtub faucet. Now I don't have to worry anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sechler

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, like it more than the other options on the market. Perfect protection for kids and not so distracting for bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Linne

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: You'll have to cut a slot for your shower diverter and the plastic smells toxic. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Didn't blow up enough to fit snug on the faucet. My son was able to easily pull it off. ( The pint of getting it was so he couldn't take it off and mess with the faucet) so was definitely a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Trumbaturi (Beals)

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every parent.
customer_reviews.text: I had this kids years ago, and bought one for a friend's daughter who's having her 1st baby
customer_reviews.author: JodiRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that it was inexpensive and that it actually did what it says, protect the tub faucet. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really like to stay on the faucet. It's ok I guess but wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Does not fall off of diverterless spouts.
customer_reviews.text: Most spout protectors require a diverter to be part of the spout so it won't fall off. This one does not. Once applied, it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunky

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: For the price can’t really complain I haven’t put it to work yet but I did notice that after inflating it seemed like some air went out it’s bot as full and bubbly
customer_reviews.author: Britny e.

customer_reviews.title: Love these, and they work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Love these, and they work like a charm. The other solid plastic types are almost as hard as the faucets they cover, but these are as soft as can be (since obviously inflatable). Already had our one year old bump them twice while bathing like nothing happened. (I also bought 4 more to put in the garage on our bicycle pedals and handlebar tips, since the bikes hang waste level on the wall and we bump them on occassion, LOL. Innovation I say!)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Must have for 1 year old bath time!
customer_reviews.text: This product is such a life saver with a one year old! I was so skeptical but for the price I thought “why not try it” and I don’t regret it! My 1 year old can sometimes slip and slide during bath time and I was so nervous about him hitting the faucet. This makes bath time a whole lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kcollins14

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!!! I bought and tried 5 other spout covers but none of them would work and this one works great and was by far the cheapest of them all.
customer_reviews.author: Gene G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT!! Bought for when my grand daughter comes over to visit. put it on, it fit great on our standard tub faucet, and have not taken it off since. Have not needed to re-inflate it or anything! Bought one for my daughter for her house as well and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: KDU, Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a spout That became old and it works perfect and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Ragan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, I thought it would have inflated more but good for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wegner

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: There’s no hole for a shower stopper which is fine. Easy to blow up & put on tub faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: This product works for us! Don't have to worry about head injuries for my kiddos during bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pastirko

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't trap the dampness around the spigot like the Elmo cover we had ended up doing
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't trap the dampness around the spigot like the Elmo cover we had ended up doing. The Elmo cover caused a mold problem and although we were able to eradicate the problem with Tilex, the mold still creeped us out enough for us to get this Dreambaby cover. Overall this is a great buy for the price. The little guy can remove it if he wants to with some effort but he rarely does.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Low cost. Easy to blow up. Easy to put on. Snug fit. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good spout cover for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This spout cover fits over our bath spout, which is a feat. It takes a bit of lung strength to inflate it; I had to ask my husband to do it for me, but it has stayed inflated, is nice and puffy, and has kept the kids' noggins safe. I had a spout cover in the past that was hard plastic, and got very moldy on the inside. This one seems like it will be easy to wipe down and keep clean. I'm pretty happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Son popped the first one we had. But decently priced to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. It got a hole right away. Lasted only for 1 bath.
customer_reviews.author: mabclbtlb

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love this but after a few days, it deflated. We kept blowing it up again but it would deflate again after a few days. It also wasn't a good fit for our spout so we couldn't keep it on while we turned on water or else it would spray everywhere. And if my little one was walking or moving around the tub, she easily knocked it off the spout. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jtatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grand babies. I always had one when my children were little and know that it stopped a lot of bo bo's so I finally found this inflatable one and love it. We went through quite a few of the really cute hard ones. They prevented serious injuries but still hurt when the children would fall on it. This inflatable one does not hurt at all. It has saved a lot of tears.
customer_reviews.author: C. Maone

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet durable
customer_reviews.text: Simple, small and subtle and actually pretty durable. My little one can take it off the spout but he could probably do that with most spout covers. The cover is actually very durable for what it is. Great value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job covering the spout and easy to blow up! Super cost effective too!
customer_reviews.author: sleepyeyes

customer_reviews.title: Compact but provides poor protection
customer_reviews.text: I like that this deflates and doesn't take up much space, but the padding is inadequate. I've included photos of our bath faucet. The cover fits it fine, but the inflated areas just don't provide the protection I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt slip off!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few days but so far it doesn't fall off my spout at all! Unlike the elephant shaped one I got from a j&j gift set which never stayed on. And my 14 month old hasnt tried to take it off yet. For the price especially it's great so far!
customer_reviews.author: emjen91

customer_reviews.title: Safe bath time!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is good and easy to set up. Just blow it up takes about a minute and then slip it over the bath faucet. My faucet is a little bit longer and doesn't fit perfectly so every once and a while i have to readjust it or make sure its not blocking the flow of water. But my child has not hurt herself and it does a great job of protecting her head from the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: A wise choice
customer_reviews.text: So far holding up, have had a few months now. Removes easily and works well for travel. An inexpensive way to protect your little one's head from the bathtub faucet. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: SiouxzQ

customer_reviews.title: Skip this, spend the extra for a Skip Hop
customer_reviews.text: Lasted three baths before it leaked at a seam. About what I expected. Also had a terrible chemical plastic smell, as expected. Replaced it with Skip Hop Baby Infant and Toddler Moby Soft Rubber Bath Spout Cover and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Laurennn

customer_reviews.title: Only used a few times before it got a hole
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last very, before it got a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor elicit
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, but when fully inflated, it does not hug the faucet very well. Twirls around the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Ungashick

customer_reviews.title: Protection is important !
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and my son loves looking at the whales ! The only problem about this was that it only lasted a couple weeks and then got a hole in it ...
customer_reviews.author: Raynah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Simple, inexpensive and effective. Better bumper than a plastic cover, about the same, but less expensive than a foam one. Just be sure to remove and clean it fairly frequently to avoid mildew build up inside (which can be a problem for any kind of spout cover.)
customer_reviews.author: BKemp

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bumper. Mine hasnt ever deflated and both a 16 month and 3.5 year old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Workman

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: On the 1st use, when I went to pop the shower plunger through the punch out slot for it, it tore into the air compartment. It wouldn't hold air after that. It tore very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mooney

customer_reviews.title: much better
customer_reviews.text: finally! tried those other ones sold in stores. they come in the shape of some animal etc. they are hard plastic. they would NOT fit over the faucet with the shower lever. this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: not secure attachement:/
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit securely on spout. It came off right away when barely touched by child as well as the water coming out fast. My kids messed with spout more than usual to see this so defeited purpose for me:/
customer_reviews.author: Shannon collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a spout cover for my kids bathroom. Was happy to find one that is soft & not super pricey! It arrived quickly & fits perfect! I cut a little hole in the top part for the shower pull & just as other reviews said, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix for protecting against bumps in the bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Easy fix for protecting against bumps in the bathtub. I also like that it has fit all brands of tubs we've tried, including ones with shower controls on top of the spout or at the opening of the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: ... the rubber ducky spout cover but my toddler would easily pull it off
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the rubber ducky spout cover but my toddler would easily pull it off. She hated that duck. The white color of this one is unobtrusive and it sticks really well to the spout but allows me to move it up when I need to pull the shower nob.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.Serine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is super cute and sturdy. Excellent quality for the price! I’d order it again if I needed to, but it’s been so durable...we may never need another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my tub. My son like to try and put his head under the spout to let the water hit his face and was hitting his head. This works great. Much cheaper than the hard plastic models, too.
customer_reviews.author: SGL

customer_reviews.title: You think you need this but you probably just need to be better at bath time.
customer_reviews.text: It fits sort of but definitely not universal. Almost becomes a bigger problem cause the kid just wants to play with it and rip it off the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bath spout is great! Exactly what I was needing and looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: This bath spout is great! Exactly what I was needing and looking for at the perfect price. Easy to inflate and my son hasn't been able to take it off the spout.
customer_reviews.author: ALW

customer_reviews.title: The only spout cover we can get to stay on our tub faucet!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several spout covers for our tub faucet which does not have the shower diverting lever and this is the only one that will actually stay on. I wish we had found this one from the beginning because it would have saved us many headaches!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit :/
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a gigantic tub spout, this thing isn’t going to stay on! Also doesn’t like to stay blown up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry White

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off
customer_reviews.text: I would rather have this one than the more expensive ones because these slide on/off easily. This way, there is no need to leave them on and you can slide them off to air dry...stopping mold from forming.
customer_reviews.author: Cderrick

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect spout cover for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect spout cover for our needs! The vinyl material is very durable, with an adorable design that any child is sure to love. I love the fact that the product is inflatable, which provides extra cushion when my son bumps his head on the faucet. The nautical theme even matches our bathroom decor! It fit our odd-shaped spout great!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Only thing its missing is a hole for the slider so you can leave it on and take a shower. Besides that...really good.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Barhorst

customer_reviews.title: If you get one that keeps air then great otherwise...
customer_reviews.text: If this kept air in it then I could give it 5 stars. It came quickly, fits, inexpensive and looks cute. However, it doesn't stay inflated which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: A.McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my baby boy loves it and likes to poke it sometimes in the tub and most importantly it keeps my babies head safe in the tub
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions said to place on spout and push the lever through the top. Didn't happen, plastic was to thick and popped it. Had to throw it right out. Might be a slight user error, but maybe instructions should be more clear and cut first or thin out the fabric on top.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestMama445

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft spout cover
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for me. I was looking for a soft spout cover (most are too hard) and one that my son could not get off in the bathtub. This was easy to inflate and fits snugly over my bath spout. My son loves to poke it but it doesn't deflate and he isn't able to get it off. It also doesn't interfere with the water coming out.
customer_reviews.author: ssarkey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Thank you! Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Stella Lanius

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the price, but it is a great product! Fits really well on our faucet and the hole underneath to let water through works perfectly. Super easy to use and stays on the faucet just fine. Used it for a few weeks and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Franc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews on this, I was a little skeptical. With how cheap it was, I figured it was worth a try. It blew up easily, fits the faucet perfectly, and covers the faucet completely. And it was so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I have to blow it back up every few days but it's the only one I have found that will work with our spout , which has a handheld shower diverted.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMomAndSons

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It’s soft and easy to remove ! Safe and great price .
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the budget. Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect great for traveling. Sometimes the baby gets fixated on cover AMD tried to remove it. Easily removed from spout.
customer_reviews.author: Austezee

customer_reviews.title: Love that it comes ina two pack
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Love that it comes ina two pack, inexpensive, hold up and are actually soft! Goodbye hard whales
customer_reviews.author: Ginger_Bread_Man

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have found it
customer_reviews.text: All the other faucet covers didn't work with our mid-century tub but this one did the trick! Happy to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got this after I had been given one of the cutesie hard plastic covers and was afraid it would actually damage the faucet it was so hard. I love this one! I remember my parents had one for us kids like this and its the same style I use with my kids. Shipping was swift and product was just as the description said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C

product_meta.title: Dreambaby Bath Tub Spout Cover (Fish, 2 Pack)
product_meta.description: Color:Fish| Size:2 PackDreambaby Soft Bath Spout Covers are a fantastic way to help prevent little ones from nasty bumps and bruises that can occur if they fall and hit the spout. They can also help prevent scalding from dripping taps.
feature_bullets: There is no substitute for adult supervision in the bathroom but Dreambaby bathroom safety products can help you avoid potentially dangerous accidents and give you greater peace of mind.
Provides a soft, safe cushion that helps keep your baby safe at bath time.
Dreambaby Soft Bath Spout Covers inflate easily and slide over any standard spout.
Cute design that will complement any bathroom décor. - A great addition to your bathroom babyproofing checklist.

specifications.Safety warning: Dreambaby® Soft Bath Spout Covers are a fantastic way to help prevent little ones from nasty bumps and bruises that can occur if they fall and hit the spout. They can also help prevent scalding from dripping taps.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars563 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
